topic.title: About the Conference
topic.section:
Title and Conference Description. The contents are automatically filled in with information provided in Conference Title and Conference Description when setting up the Hosted Conference, and can be modified here.

Principal Contact for Conference Website. The details of the principal contact can be added.

Copyright Notice. The default copyright notice can be modified, with options to require authors to agree to the copyright notice as part of the submission process, and to post the Creative Commons license logo on the conference web site.

Archive Access Policy. There are options to require users' accounts with conference website for viewing archived abstracts and presentations, and for commenting on archived presentations. See {help_topic key="conference.generalManagement.websiteManagement.additional" text="Access to Conference Presentations"} for additional settings.

Privacy Statement. The default privacy statement can be modified.

Add Item to Appear in "About the Conference". Additional information may be added, and will be displayed as a new entry under Policies on the conference's About page. By clicking on "Add About Item", another new entry may be added below.
